rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting, designed to welcome guests.
rooms.vastu_notes: Aligned with North for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area integrated with a home theater section for entertainment purposes. Uses sustainable materials and natural ventilation.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed towards the South-West to balance energy.

rooms.name: Eco-friendly Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials. Features a central island for work and casual dining.
rooms.vastu_notes: Aligned to the South-East to promote prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy master bedroom designed with natural light and indoor greenery. It also integrates a small home office area.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed in the North-West for calmness and rest.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural materials.
rooms.vastu_notes: Located adjacent to bedroom; ensure proper ventilation.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large sliding door made of sustainable wood that provides natural ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Access Door
openings.description: Door leading to the rooftop terrace for direct access during favorable weather.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive green space offering views, equipped with solar panels for eco-friendly energy generation. Includes seating and natural planters.

openings.name: Rooftop Access Door
openings.description: Access door from the living room to the terrace ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
